Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate at least two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can include clear drawings of the string connecting two cups, demonstrating the device's ability to send sound.
The student can depict how the device utilizes sound waves to communicate information between students.
The student can show that the materials used for the string telephone are what have been provided (e.g., cups, string).
The student can include details showing the function of the telephone, like spoken words traveling along the string.
The student can illustrate the distance over which communication occurs and how the device helps in communicating over that distance.
The student can draw the students' use of the string telephone as a solution to the problem of communicating over distance.
